Generation IV.Diamond: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on honey collected by Combee .
Generation IV.Pearl: When endangered, grubs from its six-cell honeycomb strike back. There is only one in a colony.
Generation IV.Platinum: It releases various pheromones to make the grubs in its body do its bidding while fighting foes.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It raises grubs in the holes in its body. It secretes pheromones to control Combee .
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It raises grubs in the holes in its body. It secretes pheromones to control Combee .

Generation VIII.Sword: It skillfully commands its grubs in battles with its enemies. The grubs are willing to risk their lives to defend Vespiquen.
Generation VIII.Shield: Vespiquen that give off more pheromones have larger swarms of Combee attendants.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on nectar collected by Combee .
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: When it is in danger, grubs from its six-cell honeycomb strike back. There is only one in a colony.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Commands its subjects to build its hive. It will dispatch any interlopers who dare sneak into its nest and use them as nourishment for itself.

Generation IX.Violet: It raises grubs in the holes in its body. It secretes pheromones to control Combee .
